import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { Link, useParams } from "react-router-dom"; import useSinglePost from "../custom-hooks/useSinglePost"; import "../css/SinglePost.css" import MD from 'react-markdown' import usePosts from "../custom-hooks/usePosts" import {getPosts2} from "../contentful" function SinglePost() { const { id } = useParams() const [posts, isLoading] = usePosts(); const santizingPosts = posts.filter(post => post.fields.slug === id); //console.log('bbbb',santizingPosts[0]?.fields ) const newData = santizingPosts[0]?.fields getPosts2(id).then(res => console.log('hello',res)) return( <> { newData && newData !== null &&
Back to All Blog Posts

{newData.title}

{newData.dateTime}
Share
Tweet
Share
} ) // return(true) } export default SinglePost
